programme.title: Dating the Delaneys
programme.desc: Three generations of Delaney women explore the highs and lows of modern-day dating, learning that love and romance can be found at any age -- and sometimes where they least expect it.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Josh's Third Serving
programme.desc: When after school programs see their funding cut, teachers Josh and Ella turn to fundraising before banding together in search of a larger donation, falling hard along the way.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Kiki's Fourth Ingredient
programme.desc: Kiki is overjoyed and then overwhelmed when she agrees to cater a big wedding. She turns to Clay for support. Together, Kiki and Clay prove that the best ingredient is love.

programme.title: Sweet Autumn
programme.desc: Aunt Dee splits her candy shop between her niece Maggie and maple farmer Dex. Following letters Dee left, the two uncover the reason for her decision during the Sweet Autumn festival.

programme.desc: Goldy agrees to cater an elaborate wedding, but a dead groom and a missing bridezilla brings her together with Tom again.
